body.name: Weehom Full Size Bed Frame with Headboard, Heavy Duty Steel Slat Support Platform Under Bed Storage Space No Box Spring Needed, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 48 mins
features: Full Bed Frames Dimensions: 77.55" x 55.91" x 41.73" (L*W*H),no mattress comes. 11.2" ample under-bed storage space offers plenty of space to store toys, books, and more, keeping the room tidy and clean.
Unique Heart-shaped Headboard: This bed frame features a cute heart-shaped headboard, adding an lovely and romantic decoration for any room. Perfect for kids,teens and adults.

Durable and Sturdy Structure: The platform bed is designed with a solid steel frame structure, reinforced with 16 metal slats and 10 supporting legs to ensure the durability of the frame, providing a reliable and safe sleeping space for you or you kids.
No Box Spring Needed: Reliable and closely spaced metal slats are designed to support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam, or spring mattress without the need for a box spring.

Easy to Assemble: The easy-to-follow instructions and included tools allow for a quick and hassle-free setup within 35 minutes. Every part is clearly labeled and numbered, saving your time and effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The bed was very sturdy and well built, but it does take 2 people to assemble. After assembly, it was very nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Perfect
reviews.reviewText: The product came quickly, assembly was fast and easy and it is just a piece of nostalgia in my granddaughter's room. She immediately gave hugs and couldn't wait to try out her bed. I asked her to let the foam mattress expand but she tore herself away from a nearby chair and laid in the bed. The white goes well as her colors are purples, blues, pinks, and white.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter wanted a pink room, we didn’t want to go overboard and decided on accent pinks everywhere starting with the bed. It was the right color, a lighter pastel pink and not a super bright pink. It comes in a million pieces so it does take a few hrs to put together, it is easier with two people towards the end of building it when you have to get all the bigger pieces screwed together. It is sturdy and only needs a mattress. It is also a convenient height to be able to store things underneath as well. For a kids bed it does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Full Bed Review
reviews.reviewText: My daughter ordered the full sized bed for her room. It arrived within the expected time frame and the box wasn’t damaged. The bed advertises having Easy assembly but this bed was not easy to assemble at all. My daughter could not assemble this bed entirely on her own and even with my help it took over 3 hours to finish. All of the necessary pieces to put the bed together were included but the instructions provided could’ve been more clear & helpful. After finally finishing putting the bed together, it looked very pretty. The storage space underneath is great for shoes, containers, etc. The bed is also easy to move around and reposition if necessary. My daughter is getting a mattress protector for a little bit more comfortability but overall she’s happy with her purchase at the moment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order as expected
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful. Easy to assemble. Daughter over it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The screws and parts came mixed up so it was hard to tell what goes where. There were screws missing as well. Assembling this product was not easy, it took me between 2-3 hours to assembly due to trying to figure the screws. The bed is not sturdy at all, just of one night of a 5 year old sleeping on it, the rails underneath were bending.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First time buying a bed off of Amazon & it’s great. It came in many pieces, but Assembly wasn’t too difficult. This is for my 8y/o and it’s perfect for her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to build however you will need someone to help you halfway through. I have a Full size bed and it fits perfectly (:
